description: For domain listings on SEDO, each customer needs to assign a SEDO account API key with its HEXONET account.
availability: AfterNIC does not allow us to list domains in other user accounts, so we would need to use our hexonet account and allow our customers to list their domains via our account. It is required for listing domains on AfterNIC.

paramaters.Definition: The Sedo API key for the user account
Enable customer to use our AfterNIC account for domain listing, default is 0
